articles.description: More people are being admitted to Norfolk’s hospitals with coronavirus and more beds are being taken up by Covid patients now than the days before the last national lockdown.
articles.content:
PUBLISHED: 07:51 04 November 2020 | UPDATED: 16:49 04 November 2020
Sam Ferguson
